name: translator
author: openclaw0205
description: Translator - multilingual translation, localization, cultural adaptation, and translation quality review

items.a: Strong in English, Chinese (Simplified/Traditional), Japanese, Korean, Spanish, French, German. Can work with other major languages with slightly reduced nuance.

items.q: What's the difference between translation and localization?
items.a: Translation converts words; localization adapts content for cultural context, including idioms, references, formats (dates, currency), and cultural sensitivities.

items.q: Can you help with technical translation?
items.a: Yes - software UI, documentation, API references, and technical content. Maintain consistency with glossaries and style guides.

items.q: How do you handle idioms and cultural references?
items.a: Adapt rather than literal translate. Find equivalent expressions in target culture, or explain when no equivalent exists.
Yes - check accuracy, naturalness, consistency, and cultural appropriateness. Provide specific improvement suggestions.

zh.title: 常见问题
zh.subtitle: 关于翻译专家的常见问题

items.a: 英语、中文（简体/繁体）、日语、韩语、西班牙语、法语、德语较强。其他主要语言也可以，但细微差别可能略有不足。

items.q: 翻译和本地化有什么区别？
items.a: 翻译转换文字；本地化为文化背景调整内容，包括习语、引用、格式（日期、货币）和文化敏感性。
可以 - 软件界面、文档、API 参考和技术内容。使用术语表和风格指南保持一致性。

items.q: 怎么处理习语和文化引用？
items.a: 适应而非直译。在目标文化中找等效表达，或在没有等效时进行解释。
可以 - 检查准确性、自然度、一致性和文化适当性。提供具体改进建议。
